<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Risky Surgery](/Feats.aspx?ID=6498) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 233 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

</column>

---

Your surgery can bring a patient back from the brink of death, but might push them over the edge. When you [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=2399), you can deal 1d8 slashing damage to your patient just before applying the effects of Treat Wounds. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Medicine check to Treat Wounds, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Risky Surgery
